response.overview: The feature documentary that recounts the history of Naval Aviation and the unique breed of warriors who operate from the deck of aircraft carriers. The all-powerful synergy of both sea and air has produced extraordinary icons who set a standard of excellence, second to none. The fascinating story of how Naval Aviation was developed is told in "Legends of Carrier Aviation" with the introduction of Orville Wright conducting demonstration flights for the US Army In 1908. The US Navy, not to be outdone, investigates this new invention and realize the airplane can be invaluable in Naval warfare. Strap in for the documentary that will have you at the edge of your seat.
response.tagline: The feature documentary that recounts the history of Naval Aviation and the unique breed of warriors who operate from the deck of aircraft carriers.
response.title: Legends of Carrier Aviation
